## Version 2.0.0.0 | [INSERT RELEASE DATE HERE]

* Site is now entirely remade in [Quarto](https://quarto.org).
* UI overhaul.
* New favicon.
* New Home page.
* New About Me page.
* ForBlog is no longer the main landing page.
* Redesigned ForBlog home page.
* New ForBlog post layout.
* ForBlog posts can now be filtered.
* Added a ForBlog only search bar.
* App playground has been added; a place where I can host my various creations.
* The ability for the ForBlog to be included in an RSS feed has been removed for the meantime.


## Version 1.0.0.0 | 15 May 2022

* Initial release.
* Site is built on [fastpages](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages), by [fastai](https://fast.ai).
